data.title: Jazz Christmas albums
data.text:
1.

Wrapped in Red

Album by Kelly Clarkson

Overview: Wrapped in Red is the sixth studio album by American recording artist Kelly Clarkson, released on October 25, 2013 by RCA Records. The album is a follow-up to her first greatest hits album, Greatest Hits ...

0 0

2.

12 Songs Of Christmas

Album by Bing Crosby

Overview: 12 Songs of Christmas is a 1964 studio album by Frank Sinatra, Bing Crosby and Fred Waring with his orchestra.

0 0

3.

Christmas Fantasy

Album by Anita Baker

Overview: Christmas Fantasy is the seventh studio album by American R&B singer Anita Baker. It is Baker's first (and only) holiday album, and was released on October 4, 2005 by Blue Note Records. The album peaked ...

0 0

4.

When My Heart Finds Christmas

Album by Harry Connick Jr.

Overview: When My Heart Finds Christmas is American artist Harry Connick, Jr.'s first Christmas album. Released in 1993, it is among the most popular holiday collections of the past two decades in the United States ...

0 0

5.

December

Album by Chris Botti

Overview: December is the fifth studio album by trumpet player Chris Botti. It was released by Columbia Records on October 22, 2002. Botti himself provided vocal on "Perfect Day" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little ...

0 0

6.

A Jolly Christmas From Frank Sinatra

Album by Frank Sinatra

Overview: A Jolly Christmas from Frank Sinatra is a Christmas album by American singer Frank Sinatra, originally released by Capitol Records in 1957.

0 0

7.

The Dean Martin Christmas Album

Album by Dean Martin

Overview: The Dean Martin Christmas Album is a 1966 studio album by Dean Martin arranged by Ernie Freeman and Bill Justis.

0 0

Christmas Songs

Album by Diana Krall

Overview: Christmas Songs is a 2005 (see 2005 in music) album by Diana Krall performed with the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra. This is Krall's first full-length album of Christmas songs (not counting 1998's Have ...

0 0

9.

It's Christmas

Album by Ledisi Young

Overview: It's Christmas is the Christmas album of singer, Ledisi. The album peaked #28 on the Top R&B charts. This is Ledisi's second release on Verve Forecast. This Christmas was released as the lead single ...

0 0

10.

Memories Of A Winter's Night

Album by Dave Koz

Overview: Memories of a Winter's Night is the compilation album by saxophone player Dave Koz. Koz's third holiday album contains tracks from previous holiday albums and new tunes. The album was released by Capitol ...

0 0

11.

The Magic Of Christmas

Album by Nat 'King' Cole

Overview: The Magic of Christmas is a 1960 album by Nat King Cole, arranged by Ralph Carmichael.

0 0

12.

White Christmas

Album by Rosemary Clooney

Overview: White Christmas is a 1996 studio album by Rosemary Clooney. This was Clooney's only Christmas album, she had previously appeared in the film, White Christmas (1954).

0 0

Ella Fitzgerald's Christmas

Album by Ella Fitzgerald

Overview: Ella Fitzgerald's Christmas is a 1967 studio album by Ella Fitzgerald. This was her second Christmas album. Unlike her previous Christmas album (which was almost completely secular), this album consisted ...

What A Night! A Christmas Album

Album by Harry Connick Jr.

Overview: What a Night! A Christmas Album, by American singer, pianist and bandleader Harry Connick, Jr., was released on November 4, 2008., being his third Christmas album, since 1993's When My Heart Finds Christmas ...

Merry from Lena

Album by Lena Horne

Overview: Merry from Lena is a 1966 album by Lena Horne. Released in 1966 this Christmas album marked Lena Horne's departure from United Artists and the recording industry until her return at Skye Records in 1970 ...

16.

Harry For The Holidays

Album by Harry Connick Jr.

Overview: Harry for the Holidays is American artist Harry Connick, Jr.'s second Christmas album, released in 2003. The album features Connick and his 16 piece Big Band and a full string section.

Album by Dave Koz

Overview: A Smooth Jazz Christmas is the sixth studio album by saxophone player Dave Koz. Koz's second holiday album was released by Capitol Records on September 25, 2001. Friends include David Benoit, Rick Braun ...

Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas

Album by Ella Fitzgerald

Overview: Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas is a 1960 album by the American jazz singer Ella Fitzgerald, recorded in the summer of 1960, with a studio orchestra arranged and conducted by Frank DeVol.
